SELECT DF.DocumentNo , DF.FormID , DF.Title , DF.Period , DF.Customer , DF.DepartmentName , DF.Purpose , DF.DueDate , DF.ReturnDate , DF.CreatorName , DF.Tags , DF.CreatedAt FROM DocumentForm DF WHERE DF.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID;
SELECT DD.DetailNo , DD.DocumentNo , DD.ProductName , DD.Standard , DD.Quantity , DD.UnitPrice , DD.Amount , DD.Surtax , DD.CategoryName FROM DocumentForm DF INNER JOIN DocumentDetail DD ON DF.DocumentNo = DD.DocumentNo WHERE DD.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID AND DD.DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';

statement.if: INSERT INTO DocumentDetail ( DocumentNo , Standard , ProductName , Quantity , UnitPrice , Amount , Surtax , CategoryName , DetailCategory , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @DocumentNo , @Standard , @ProductName , @Quantity , @UnitPrice , @Amount , @Surtax , @CategoryName , 'DetailItems1' , DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') );

UPDATE DocumentDetail SET Standard = @Standard , ProductName = @ProductName , Quantity = @Quantity , UnitPrice = @UnitPrice , Amount = @Amount , Surtax = @Surtax , CategoryName = @CategoryName , ModifiedAt = DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
DELETE FROM DocumentDetail WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
